channel.title: How do i create an ip and create mods and admins?
channel.description:
Hi, i need help on these following things:
-Giving mods and admins
-creating an ip for my server
So far, when i click on serverrun, then i go to my silabsoft client and then i put in a username and a password with no ip address and my server comes up, can anyone teach me how to make an ip?
And plz teach me how to give admins and mods :)
Thankz
and my item spawning doesnt work, i typed ::pickup 1050 1 doesnt work

item.title: How do i create an ip and create mods and admins?
item.dc:creator: @xx_k03d_xx xx k03d xx
item.description:
@xx_k03d_xx wrote:

i did use cmd ipconfig to find my ip.

BUt i turned my server on, i tried da server on my pc (server turned on on laptop) and it didnt work, i tried all da ip’s on the ipconfig

Read full topic

item.title: How do i create an ip and create mods and admins?
item.dc:creator: @kevvdogg kevvdogg
item.description:
@kevvdogg wrote:

it only happens for you because it gos on w/e port u are using so other people have to type the ip when they log in ur server

just go in to there text file in charecters and where it says player rights change to
1=mod 2=admin 3=owner 4=hidden owner

Read full topic
